item.title: PayPal – ‘Small Business Tips’
item.dc:creator: Kyle
item.description:
PayPal wanted to help small businesses stay ahead of the game before the holiday rush. We worked with them (and two industry leaders/influencers), to help small and mid-sized business owners identify and avoid some common mistakes.

The post PayPal – ‘Small Business Tips’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
item.content:encoded:
PayPal wanted to help small businesses stay ahead of the game before the holiday rush. We worked with them (and two industry leaders/influencers), to help small and mid-sized business owners identify and avoid some common mistakes.

The post PayPal – ‘Small Business Tips’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.

item.title: Progressive Waste Solutions – ‘New Fleet Launch’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
Progressive Waste Solutions is one of North America’s largest full-service, vertically integrated waste solutions companies, providing non-hazardous waste collection, recycling, and landfill disposal services to more than four million customers.

item.content:encoded:
